reviewText:
you can see the future of a very talented actor unfolding. i have always been a Curtis fan, he did not let the system beat him. He gave many steller performances in his 30 year career, by not giving up like so many others
Including my self, who ttied but gave up trying after so many rejections.
Early Curtis movie was very entertaining. Sound,storyline was very good. I would recommend to friends from the 50's generation. I'm happy for what it is worth.
